subject: Concussions
Interscholastic Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: A former high school quarterback sued the Illinois High School Association, saying it did not do enough to protect him from concussions when he played and still does not do enough to protect players.
snippet: A former high school quarterback sued the Illinois High School Association, saying it did not do enough to protect him from concussions when he played and still does not do enough to protect players.
